welcome_page.introtext: You are employed at XYZ AG and assigned there as an assistant to the management. At the moment, the mood in the office is a bit tense. Next week there will be a meeting with important business partners and you still haven't received all the appointment confirmations. And the gift you ordered on behalf of the department for a retiring co-worler should also have been delivered by now. So this is how you start your workday and the first thing you do is check your e-mails.
welcome_page.press_start: Click on the "Start" icon or press the Windows key
welcome_page.thunderbird_search: Type in "Thunderbird" and click on the following search result

task1.introtext: You are employed at XYZ AG and assigned there as an assistant to the management. At the moment, the mood in the office is a bit tense. Next week there will be a meeting with important business partners and you still haven't received all the appointment confirmations. And the gift you ordered on behalf of the department for a retiring co-worler should also have been delivered by now. So this is how you start your workday and the first thing you do is check your e-mails.
task1.accept_appointment: Accept appointment commitments and enter them in the calendar.
task1.sent_present: Has the farewell gift been sent?
